sentences.sentence: It was, he said later, one of the blackest days of his political career.
sentences.translation: 后来他说，那一天是他政治生涯中最糟糕的日子之一。

sentences.sentence: A lie which is half a truth is ever the blackest of lies.
sentences.translation: 真假参半的谎言最险恶。

sentences.sentence: It was the biggest and blackest and blackest he had ever seen.
sentences.translation: 这是他有生以来见过的最大、最黑的马。
